text:
August 29, 1963
Mr* Earl W. Stevick
4420 North Henderson Road
Arlington 3, Virginia 22203
Dear Mr, Stevick;
We are pleased to know that it will be convenient for you to review the
scripts which are being prepared for the Voice of America. Although we
are involved in this work under contract with the Voice of America,
please be assured that your employment is by the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters and your stipend will be processed through our
office.
We are enclosing the scripts for the first sixteen programs. Ohe additional
twenty-two programs will be sent shortly.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
JAF:sc
Enclosures
